name: SR: Racing
description:
Become the king of street racing and adrenaline along with Street Racing game for mobile devices! Tap on the gas and become a part of the world of street racing, exclusive cars and underground! Win in the race and become the best racer of the city!


EXCLUSIVE CARS!

Great choice of cars and customization! Choose your car and become the king of extreme racing.
Upgrade your car and drive at prohibitive speeds! Create a house on the road with the machine-trampoline. Be faster than all together with a bolid car. Fear with a crazy truck!


DRIVE FAST!

Drive along the city highways! Do jumps on the auto-truck, accelerate and throw in the air oncoming cars! Dominate on the road and be the first! Can you become the best racer?
Are you ready to become a legend?


FEATURES:
- 1st / 3rd view!
- A lot of cars!
- A trampoline for every car!
- Customization!
- High quality graphics!
- Realistic auto physics!
